languages.text: "Палубы корабля окутывались тревожным желтым и испуганным зеленым, когда меж людей ступал Маражай... но теперь те же цвета заполоняют все вокруг, когда Лорд-капитан появляется на мостике. Меня... пугает эта перемена".

"The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."
languages.original_text: "Палубы корабля окутывались тревожным желтым и испуганным зеленым, когда меж людей ступал Маражай... но теперь те же цвета заполоняют все вокруг, когда Лорд-капитан появляется на мостике. Меня... пугает эта перемена".

traits.locale_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “每当玛拉斋从人群中走过时，甲板上就会笼罩着不安的黄色与惊恐的绿色……可现在，当舰长大人出现在舰桥上时，甲板上也弥漫着这种颜色。这样的变化……让我感到害怕。”
languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: “每当玛拉斋从人群中走过时，甲板上就会笼罩着不安的黄色与惊恐的绿色……可现在，当舰长大人出现在舰桥上时，甲板上也弥漫着这种颜色。这样的变化……让我感到害怕。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quand Marazhai s'est avancé parmi l'équipage, les ponts du vaisseau se sont nimbés d'un jaune alarmant et d'un vert terrifiant... Deux couleurs que je vois autour {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} chaque fois qu'{mf|il|elle} apparaît sur le pont, désormais. Ce changement... m'effraie. »
languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: « Quand Marazhai s'est avancé parmi l'équipage, les ponts du vaisseau se sont nimbés d'un jaune alarmant et d'un vert terrifiant... Deux couleurs que je vois autour {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} chaque fois qu'{mf|il|elle} apparaît sur le pont, désormais. Ce changement... m'effraie. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Las cubiertas de la nave estaban envueltas en un amarillo alarmante y un verde aterrado cada vez que Marazhai caminaba entre la tripulación... pero ahora los mismos colores asaltan mi visión cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se muestra en el puente. Me... inquieta este cambio».
languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: «Las cubiertas de la nave estaban envueltas en un amarillo alarmante y un verde aterrado cada vez que Marazhai caminaba entre la tripulación... pero ahora los mismos colores asaltan mi visión cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se muestra en el puente. Me... inquieta este cambio».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「マラズハイが乗組員の間を歩くたびに、船の甲板は不安を帯びた黄色と怯えた緑色に包まれた…でも、ロード・キャプテンがブリッジに現れると、私の視線は同じ色に染まるんです。私は…この変化に恐れを感じています」
languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイが乗組員の間を歩くたびに、船の甲板は不安を帯びた黄色と怯えた緑色に包まれた…でも、ロード・キャプテンがブリッジに現れると、私の視線は同じ色に染まるんです。私は…この変化に恐れを感じています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Decks des Schiffs waren in erschreckendes Gelbes und verängstigtes Grün getaucht, wenn Marazhai durch die Crew gewandelt ist ... doch nun fluten dieselben Farben meinen Blick, wenn der Lord Captain auf der Brücke erscheint. Diese Änderung macht mir ... Angst."
languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: "Die Decks des Schiffs waren in erschreckendes Gelbes und verängstigtes Grün getaucht, wenn Marazhai durch die Crew gewandelt ist ... doch nun fluten dieselben Farben meinen Blick, wenn der Lord Captain auf der Brücke erscheint. Diese Änderung macht mir ... Angst."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

languages.text: "Marazhai ne zaman gelse... Gemi güverteleri cırtlak sarılarla, felaket yeşillerle bezenirdi. Şimdi aynı renkler, Lord Kaptan'ı köprüde görünce gözümü bürüyor... Bu durum hiç hoşuma gitmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai ne zaman gelse... Gemi güverteleri cırtlak sarılarla, felaket yeşillerle bezenirdi. Şimdi aynı renkler, Lord Kaptan'ı köprüde görünce gözümü bürüyor... Ki hiç hoşuma gitmiyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
